report.title: Comparable to Methamphetamine
report.author: kemical kevmac
report.bodytext: /n /n /n I just recently discovered research chemicals, I started making my own K2 with AM-2201. While I was at the local head shop buying some flavoring drops for my synthetic pot I saw some so-called charlie sheen novelty powder I bought 1g for 40$. When I got home I did a giant line about 100mg. /n /n 10 min pass and I feel like I just did some real good coke /n /n After 30 min pass I got a amphetamine like euphoria which only lasts for about 20 min and turns into paranoia almost psychosis like /n /n 1 hour after ingesting 100mg I'm getting the urge to re-dose. /n /n 8:00 I do another 100mg line /n /n 11:00 After about 3 hours pass I convince myself to go to bed, I'm wanting to do another 100mg line but hold off and try to get some sleep. I do about a 50mg line before going to lie down. /n /n 12:30 As I'm laying still in bed I start to get the meth bugs. I couldn't believe how powerful this stuff is. I lay in bed for the next 8 hours unable to fall asleep, listening to my heartbeat race at 140 beats per min /n /n Tomorrow rolls around, I didn't get none but 2 hours of sleep. I am going to dispose of this devilish drug its probably one of the most unpleasant stimulants I've ever come across. /n /n I will never touch this drug again as I find it to be extremely addictive, just almost comparable to methamphetamine or cocaine /n /n STAY AWAY FROM THE BATHSALTS
